name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"043c2725-d4cb-481f-b26d-88df8ae72489","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: match_call","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f4efbf1-e48c-47ad-81d4-e2dae388a0f4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"match_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the core data-binding engine for function calls. Its responsibility is to map the "actual arguments" (values passed at the call site) to the "formal parameters" (variables defined in the function signature). It essentially tells the analyzer: "When ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_func","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called here, its parameter ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" takes on the value of variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b9c880a-bc53-49af-ab04-3a14e4dd6785","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis relies on tracing data flow. If a value enters a function via an argument, the analyzer must know where that value came from.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ee4c28d4-478f-4a86-9b62-513f4c43c609","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Without ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"match_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", a function body is analyzed in isolation, unaware of the specific data being passed to it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"888bb490-bf25-471c-8bce-ad186e86d7ba","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"With ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"match_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", if you pass an Integer to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"process(data)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer knows that inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"process","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"data","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an Integer.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0f1b34d-2d0e-4ec7-a678-41815fc4ba1d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17ee6277-0b07-4376-af4c-e481a654afe9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Retrieval:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It looks up the Scope object for the function being called. This scope contains the list of expected parameters (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"paramList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6cbdeb2d-49ba-45c3-9e8d-6a1e5377a6b3","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Argument Extraction:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"0aea218e-81bf-4de3-80ce-4175e1c7561e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Standard Call:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to decode the arguments passed in the AST node (positional and keyword).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fa1e7517-53a9-4afe-a937-a749e9f6f343","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Decorator:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the function is acting as a decorator, it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decoratorParam","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (usually the function being decorated) as the argument list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"2e923e1f-2d59-456d-8fcd-d45854bbe299","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mapping Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"c0aeac92-05e9-40e6-8f5f-897ea774249b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It iterates through the provided arguments.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f587b3c-4487-4f0b-b193-f81eaa73a16e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Positional:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It maps the argument at index 0 to the parameter at index 0, index 1 to parameter 1, etc.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dd6b835a-932d-4f45-9f63-1a50779467e7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Keyword:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If arguments are passed by name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(target=val)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it looks up the specific parameter name in the scope's definition list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"03d0ed11-7076-48c1-b236-fb327c325eef","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Value Propagation:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"8896e35d-3bd8-4c9c-baa4-cb05c068f254","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once a match is found (e.g., Argument ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" matches Parameter ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"limit","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it retrieves the Definition object for the parameter ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"limit","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4535a756-576b-4528-9066-1bd222762b30","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds a "value point" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"limit","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at the line number of the function definition. This permanently records that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"limit","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can hold the value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"e1c973e6-355e-4b4b-9eb2-3571066e1426","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8c548e30-16a5-433b-96b9-bd18dd002686","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"def multiply(a, b):
    return a * b

multiply(5, 2)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44c89da8-9137-4860-bfcd-1568b734d688","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"match_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" retrieves the scope for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"multiply","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", identifying parameters ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fb4424bc-50a9-432e-a858-2b87496d2749","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It identifies arguments ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"527ff8ca-174e-424f-acd3-7bc909ba8562","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It maps ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" -> ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" -> ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3c5dc434-746e-4d4c-a2f9-25a1964aa788","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It updates the definition of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to include the value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e11ed3ad-dbd4-4b4c-8ac4-ba20d90e242c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It updates the definition of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to include the value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"953c801a-b135-4756-9f07-875545658bde","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When analyzing the body ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a * b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer now knows it is multiplying two integers.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"64d70009-a893-41b9-9def-1bf93077c05d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
